keylistener

Class GlobalKeyListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • keylistener.GlobalKeyListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyListener

    public class GlobalKeyListener
extends java.lang.Thread
implements org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyListener
    Class of global keyboard listener (defined actions for PRTSCR and combination ALT+PRTSCR).
